extDesc.message: Displays CCF recommended rank of conferences/journals in dblp, Google Scholar, Connected Papers and WoS.

dblpDomainHelp.message: Enter the dblp domain to use (e.g., dblp.uni-trier.de). Default: dblp.org

settingsSaved.description: Success message when settings are saved.

domainRequired.description: Error message when domain is empty.
